event.title: situated in Yemen, some 130 km south-south-east of today

data.event: Ẓafār or Dhafar (Ar ظفار) Ðafār (museum: UTM: 435700E, 1571160 N zone 38P, 14°12'N, 44°24'E, deviating slightly from Google Earth) is an ancient Himyarite site situated in Yemen, some 130 km south-south-east of today's capital, Sana'a.

event.title: 250 years the confederacy and its allies combined territory extended

data.event: For 250 years the confederacy and its allies combined territory extended past Riyadh to the north and the Euphrates to the north-east.
